entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
